channel.title: Problem [PI]
channel.description: I get this is my server prompt when a person logs in and logs out and then it keeps saying there account is already logged in. item.title: Problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

I get this is my server prompt when a person logs in and logs out and then it keeps saying there account is already logged in.
